text:
Studies have shown that the #fasting mimicking diet can lower blood pressure and decrease levels of biomarkers associated with #cancer.

On Mon, August 6th, at 12:00 p.m. EDT we speak to the FMD creator about how #fasting may benefit the #brain LIVE here: https://t.co/yCBvE2B8lK https://t.co/Wdqb76uuy2
